Author: bruno_guy
Text: i feel the same, i start to restrict when im less active in the day or i don't feel like doing my exercises. i wish i can just go back to where i ate junk food and not worry about it. like you don't understand how much i would like to go back in time, if only wishes came true right. but i'm pretty sure from me going to 500 cals a day and doing a lot of exercise to eating 700 cals a day and just cleaning up the house and a 10 min walk everyday is fine. i don't really see a difference in my body so yeah, its hungry tho and its want to die inside because recovery is hard  ;))
